channel.title: Posts on Ashwini Manoj's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ashwini Manoj's blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World! I am planning to blogg my thoughts and learnings here. I have been writing in my head a lot these days! Today I finally decided to make it a reality. After all my tagline on facebook was “Coder. Dreamer. Developer” xD Also, I would like this to be a place where I can come back when I need a refresher. Today it is about: Creating a new hugo site for my blog Hosting this on github pages using the domain ashwinimanoj.
